name: MorphUs (itch)
description:
A game were your actions will change the world, prepare to 25 puzzles in a way you have never seen before. Have fun! :)

Instructions:

Arrows/A, D: Move

Space: Jump

X: Change Form

C: Change Element

Credits:

Alejandro Monascal

Luis Pulido

Fernando Crema

Eduardo Gonzales

Santiago de Taramona

Game made for the Global Game Jam 2014 (http://globalgamejam.org/2014/...)
